nodes.text: Hrosus, better known as Hrosus the Swift, was a male individual who became famous as a varactyl-rider. In a head-to-head race that earned him great fame, Hrosus was even able to beat a swoop bike while riding his mount.
Hrosus was first mentioned in the Codex entry for varactyls in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, but the entry did not specify his species.
